bio: I'm a software engineer with over 3 profssional years of experience in developing production based applications.
I started out as a backend developer building apps in laravel / lumen and gradually graduated into full stack when i started working with vuejs to build front-end apps.
In my second job i became a full stack developer where i built apps using Django & Django Rest Framework (DRF), PostgreSQL, VueJS2.0 & redis.
I also started my journey in to the world of software architect. I happened to be the software engineer that had a good understanding and knowledge base in Python.
I suggested frameworks and technologies to use, which i learnt by reading engineering blogs like instagram & medium.
I currentlty work as a full stack engineer with more focus on the backend. I'm tasked with providing solutions to issues arising and implementing them from frontend to backend.
